room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We escaped the Cabin in the Woods. Lamont was awesome and super energetic! He made our experience here awesome! Thanks again!!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We loved the Cabin in The Woods. Lamont was our guide and he did a great job and was very helpful. We did a siblings outing and it was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Great experience! We escaped with two minutes left from The Cabin In The Woods. Madeline, our game master, was the best! Gave us helpful tips when needed.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: I booked Cabin in the Woods for my sister's bachelorette party, and it was fantastic! Riley was the best-  she stepped in at just the right moments with clues and took some hilarious pictures/video. Great experience for large or small groups, and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an hour of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: We had a lot of fun trying to escape Cabin in the Woods today! Amy and Lamont were great at guiding us when we seemed totally lost! Our family of four did not get out in time but still had lots of fun. We plan to come back soon for our second adventure. Thanks for a great experience!
